Class AirCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • airlines.classes.objects.AirCompany
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAirCompany

    public class AirCompany
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAirCompany
    Clase para crear objetos Aircompany la cual va a ser el nucleo principal del programa.
    Author:
    Lidia Garrido Moreno
